prompt: Design a futuristic cyberpunk-themed t-shirt. Envision a bustling cityscape full of wondrous architecture, far advanced beyond our current times. The city should be awash in electric blue and vibrant pink neon lights, casting their luminescent hue on the buildings around. Bring out the dark allure of the night-time scenery, the high contrast emphasising the glowing neon lights of the cityscape. Remember that it needs to be tailored for apparel printing and needs to be print-ready.
theme: Cyberpunk city with neon lights and futuristic architecture
